name: Alive Moon
description:
This game was made for Brackeys game jam

You are an alien, who came to peoples station on the moon. All people there became zombies. Use your clone-gun, which reproduces clones of spider-like creatures, which will help you to fight with those zombies. But, be carefull, this gun requires your blood to produce your spiders. So, get to the rocket and fly away from this awful place...
